entry.title: Werther's Original Caramel Coffee Hard Candies - 2.65oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Werthers Original
Type: Candy
Price: 2.61

The sweetest way to start the morning! 

    There's nothing like a cup of coffee to start your day. Introducing Werther's Original Caramel Coffee Hard Candies! Just like your first cup of Joe in the morning, these candies are creamy and smooth with the delicious taste of caramel and coffee. They melt smoothly in your mouth, leaving a buttery sweet taste that lingers. Start your morning right or snack on them throughout the day. Made with real butter and fresh cream, for a one-of-a-kind taste. 

2.65oz

entry.title: Stockley's Sugar Free Chocolate Limes - 70g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Stockley's
Type: Candy
Price: 2.61

Tart and Sweet and Sugar Free

Tastes just as great as the sweets you remember from your childhood, but now sugar free! Try Stockley's Sugar Free Chocolate Limes hard candies, a tart lime flavoured exterior that eventually gives way to the smooth dark chocolate center. These sweets are so irresistible you'll be snacking all day!

In 1918, Malcolm Stockley returned home from the first world war to his native town of Accrington, Lancashire, to recommence the craft that he had pursued as a youngerman, that being the art of toffee making. It was from these humble beginnings, in a shed in the High Street, that the Stockley's name first became recognized as quality sweet manufacturers. Stockley's is, in fact, a living tribute to a golden age of sweet making and is guaranteed to re-kindle fond memories. The tradition, quality and love that is place into our recipes has made Stockley's one of the most recognized sweet manufacturers in Great Britain.

  • British Candy
  • Gluten-Free
  • Sugar Free

70g

entry.title: Bob Ross Make Your Own Gummy Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Boston America
Type: Candy
Price: 14.99

Create Your Own Masterpiece

Not a painter? Don't worry, this Bob Ross Make Your Own Gummy Kit will make your feel like one! This kit comes with everything you need to make beautiful and tasty gummies in 4 Fruity Flavors: Lemon, Blue Raspberry, Strawberry, and Green Apple. Make squirrels, palettes, brushes, and of course happy little trees. The kit comes complete with mold tray, colorful gummy mixes, instruction booklet and super sour powder. Continue Bob Ross' legacy by making your own delicious art candy.

Fun Fact: Bob Ross didn't want his artwork in museums. He only wanted to teach painting because he just wanted others to believe they can do it too! He wanted people to understand that anybody can make beautiful paintings like he did, with the right technique and guidance. Bob proved to us all that simply believing in yourself is key to receive excellent results. His positive beliefs & noticeable talent drew inspirations from people all around the world. Bob's joyful personality was truly contagious whether he was on or off camera, and that's why Bob is so loved up until this day.

The perfect holiday gift for artists, art-lovers, or Bob Ross fans in your life! 

Order now!

entry.title: Barnetts Mega Sour Fruits UK - 104g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Barnetts
Type: Candy
Price: 4.49

The Most Sour Candy from the UK 

Barnetts Mega Sour Fruits Sour Candy

Could Barnetts Mega Sour Fruits be the most sour candy! Well, pucker up Sweeties for the intense sour taste of these extreme sour candies from Britain. Barnetts has been a family business since the 1890's creating the same boiled sweets. They still use the original recipes. The sweets are hand made and cooked in open copper pans. That's British candy tradition!

Try all the Mega Sour candy flavours, if you dare!

  • Gluten-Free
  • Suitable for Vegetarians

104 g

WARNING: THESE SWEETS MAY CAUSE TEMPORARY MOUTH AND STOMACH DISCOMFORT IF EATEN IN EXCESS
